title: To get hyped for Halloween I decided to make a cinematic!

embed.description: Morgana walks walks around summoner's rift admiring how other champions celebrate Halloween! This is one of several Halloween cinematic's I plan to release during October. I made this cinematic mostly for looks, the next cinematic's will have a story line and voice acting! All music belongs to Brandon and Derek Fiechter: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjMZjGhrFq_4llVS_x2XJ_w Any feedback is appreciate!

replies.body:
I don't often see videos pop up on this board :D Thanks for sharing, I imagine this must have taken forever to set up! V. spoopy :D
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Thanks! I also though it would take longer but it ended up only taking a week! This cinematic was mostly for looks (no plot/story line) so it wasn't to hard to make! Being my 3rd cinematic I knew how to solve most problems that occurred which definitely shortened the time to make it! 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Those were some pretty solid shots. If ya want some tips for really spooky shots, use a slanted camera angle if possible, or rotate the scene.

Thanks for the advice! I will definitely use these tips in my next cinematic's!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Thanks! I get most of my skins through chests and I wasn't planing to buy the new Halloween skins so I was forced to make it with the old ones!

Holy shit this acctually spoopy but its not that good that you made it with morgana because its an older skin and rito isnt going to recycle it, they make new ones :/ but still really well done {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
